name: Mazes of Madness
description:
Mazes of Madness is a 2 maze prototype of a first person dungeon crawler. Our first maze depicts a small level with all the necessary game mechanics to allow you to get to grips with the game features.  The first proper maze level is a more intricate maze that features bosses and loot rooms, the more mobs you kill the more maze gold you will acquire the more powerful you can get!

WASD to move

M will open your map

I to open your inventory

E to interact with NPC'S

Left Mouse Click to attack

Shift to sprint

Escape to pause

Project created by Tom Whatmough, Michael Riley-Wallace, Reece Tarrant, RJ Fajutrao

All assets credited within the project folder.
